languages.text: {n}Ван Калокс {d|Encyclopedia:CompHeinrix_Rough}бесстрастно наблюдает{/d} за страданиями Ахиллеаса. Потом кривит губы и качает головой.{/n} "Плохо. Как ты мог не заметить надвигающуюся на Даргонус опасность? Возможно, я возлагал на тебя слишком большие надежды, Скаландр?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Ван Калокс бесстрастно наблюдает за страданиями Ахиллеаса. Потом кривит губы и качает головой.{/n} "Плохо. Как ты мог не заметить надвигающуюся на Даргонус опасность? Возможно, я возлагал на тебя слишком большие надежды, Скалландр?"

languages.text: {n}Heinrix {d|Encyclopedia:CompHeinrix_Rough}impassively observes{/d} Achilleas's torment. Then his lip curls as he shakes his head.{/n} "Poor show, Scalander. How could you fail to notice the impending danger? Perhaps I was wrong to have had such high hopes for you?"
languages.original_text: {n}Ван Калокс {d|Encyclopedia:CompHeinrix_Rough}бесстрастно наблюдает{/d} за страданиями Ахиллеаса. Потом кривит губы и качает головой.{/n} "Плохо. Как ты мог не заметить надвигающуюся на Даргонус опасность? Возможно, я возлагал на тебя слишком большие надежды, Скаландр?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix impassively observes Achilleas's torment. Then his lip curls as he shakes his head.{/n} "Poor show, Scalander. How could you fail to notice the impending danger? Perhaps I was wrong to have such high hopes for you?"

{n}Heinrix impassively observes Achilleas's torment. Then his lip curls as he shakes his head.{/n} "Poor show, Scalander. How could you fail to notice the impending danger? Perhaps I was wrong to have had such high hopes for you?"

languages.text: {n}ハインリックスは苦悩でもだえるアキレアスを{d|Encyclopedia:CompHeinrix_Rough}無表情で見詰める{/d}。そして、わずかに唇をつぐみ、首を横に振った。{/n}「哀れですね、スカランダー。迫りくる危険になぜ気づけなかったのです？お前に期待した我が間違っていたのですか？」
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix {d|Encyclopedia:CompHeinrix_Rough}impassively observes{/d} Achilleas's torment. Then his lip curls as he shakes his head.{/n} "Poor show, Scalander. How could you fail to notice the impending danger? Perhaps I was wrong to have had such high hopes for you?"

traits.locale_text: {n}ハインリックスは苦悩でもだえるアキレアスを{d|Encyclopedia:CompHeinrix_Rough}無表情で見詰める{/d}。そして、わずかに唇をつぐみ、首を横に振った。{/n}「哀れですね、スカランダー。迫りくる危険になぜ気づけなかったのです？お前に期待した我が間違っていたのですか？」

languages.text: {n}海因里希{d|Encyclopedia:CompHeinrix_Rough}无动于衷{/d}地打量着阿吉里亚斯的惨状，随后抿着嘴，摇了摇头。{/n}“真是丢人现眼，斯卡兰德。你怎么会对近在眼前的危险毫无防备？是我不该对你有这么高的期望吗？”
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix {d|Encyclopedia:CompHeinrix_Rough}impassively observes{/d} Achilleas's torment. Then his lip curls as he shakes his head.{/n} "Poor show, Scalander. How could you fail to notice the impending danger? Perhaps I was wrong to have had such high hopes for you?"

traits.locale_text: {n}海因里希无动于衷地打量着阿吉里亚斯的惨状，随后抿着嘴，摇了摇头。{/n}“真是丢人现眼，斯卡兰德。你怎么会对近在眼前的危险毫无防备？是我不该对你有这么高的期望吗？”

languages.text: {n}Heinrix {d|Encyclopedia:CompHeinrix_Rough}observa impasible{/d} el sufrimiento de Achilleas. Después, tuerce el labio y menea la cabeza.{/n} «Una actuación lamentable, Scalander. ¿Cómo ha podido no darse cuenta del inminente peligro? ¿Acaso me equivoqué al depositar mis esperanzas en usted?».
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix {d|Encyclopedia:CompHeinrix_Rough}impassively observes{/d} Achilleas's torment. Then his lip curls as he shakes his head.{/n} "Poor show, Scalander. How could you fail to notice the impending danger? Perhaps I was wrong to have had such high hopes for you?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix observa impasible el sufrimiento de Achilleas. Después, tuerce el labio y menea la cabeza.{/n} «Una actuación lamentable, Scalander. ¿Cómo ha podido no darse cuenta del inminente peligro? ¿Acaso me equivoqué al depositar mis esperanzas en usted?».

languages.text: {n}Heinrix {d|Encyclopedia:CompHeinrix_Rough}contemple{/d} les souffrances d'Achilleas sans sourciller. Il secoue la tête et affiche une moue déçue.{/n} « Je m'attendais à mieux de votre part, Scalander. Comment se fait-il que vous n'ayez pas remarqué qu'un danger approchait ? J'ai peut-être eu tort de placer de tels espoirs en vous. »
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix {d|Encyclopedia:CompHeinrix_Rough}impassively observes{/d} Achilleas's torment. Then his lip curls as he shakes his head.{/n} "Poor show, Scalander. How could you fail to notice the impending danger? Perhaps I was wrong to have had such high hopes for you?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix contemple les souffrances d'Achilleas sans sourciller. Il secoue la tête et affiche une moue déçue.{/n} « Je m'attendais à mieux de votre part, Scalander. Comment se fait-il que vous n'ayez pas remarqué qu'un danger approchait ? J'ai peut-être eu tort de placer de tels espoirs en vous. »

languages.text: {n}Heinrix {d|Encyclopedia:CompHeinrix_Rough}beobachtet teilnahmslos{/d} Achilleas' Qual. Dann verzieht er die Lippen und schüttelt den Kopf.{/n} "Schlechte Vorstellung, Scalander. Wie konntet Ihr die nahende Gefahr nicht bemerken? Es war wohl ein Irrtum von mir, größere Hoffnungen in Euch zu setzen."
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix {d|Encyclopedia:CompHeinrix_Rough}impassively observes{/d} Achilleas's torment. Then his lip curls as he shakes his head.{/n} "Poor show, Scalander. How could you fail to notice the impending danger? Perhaps I was wrong to have had such high hopes for you?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix beobachtet teilnahmslos Achilleas' Qual. Dann verzieht er die Lippen und schüttelt den Kopf.{/n} "Schlechte Vorstellung, Scalander. Wie konntet Ihr die nahende Gefahr nicht bemerken? Es war wohl ein Irrtum von mir, größere Hoffnungen in Euch zu setzen."

languages.text: {n}Heinrix, Achilleas'ın çektiği acıya {d|Encyclopedia:CompHeinrix_Rough}aldırış etmeden seyrediyor{/d}. Ardından yüzünü ekşitip başını iki yana sallıyor.{/n} "Olmamış Scalander. Bu tehlikeyi nasıl göremezsin? Amacın, sana olan umudumu boşa mı çıkarmaktır?"
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix {d|Encyclopedia:CompHeinrix_Rough}impassively observes{/d} Achilleas's torment. Then his lip curls as he shakes his head.{/n} "Poor show, Scalander. How could you fail to notice the impending danger? Perhaps I was wrong to have had such high hopes for you?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix, Achilleas'ın çektiği acıya aldırış etmeden seyrediyor. Ardından yüzünü ekşitip başını iki yana sallıyor.{/n} "Olmamış Scalander. Bu tehlikeyi nasıl göremezsin? Amacın, sana olan umudumu boşa mı çıkarmaktır?"
